name: H.I.E.M.S: Holiday Build
description:
WARNING: THIS IS A VERY EARLY AND SHORT DEMO, ACTUAL GAME MIGHT NOT REFLECT WHAT YOU SEE IN THIS BUILD.

H.I.E.M.S, a game taking place during winter in an "abandon" city, infested with robots. 

"A" and "D" to move

Hold "S" to crouch

Left click to shoot

"E" to interact with objects

Sorry for this extremely short demo, had to release before christmas for obvious reasons :P

Give me feedback or comments I'd love to see what you guys have to say :D.
